story_27_51000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Please! Just let us see the young master!
It sounds like he’s really struggling right now.
story_27_51000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Yeah! We’d have him cheered up in no time if
you’d just let us taaalk to him! Come on!
story_27_51000/2401_1001_0400_10:
The answer is no! Master Lear is taking a rest at
the moment.
story_27_51000/2401_1001_0500_10: And besides, you two are far too soft on him.
story_27_51000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Right now, Master Lear is at a critical juncture in
his preparation to assume the throne. I’m going to
have to ask you to leave.
story_27_51000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Come, Master Lear! To become a great king,
you must put in a great amount of effort.
It’s time to resume your training!
story_27_51000/2401_1001_1400_10: Don’t tell me you’re exhausted already?!
story_27_51000/2401_1001_1500_10:
As king, you’ll carry the fate of the entire kingdom
on your shoulders! You must be prepared!
story_27_51000/2401_1001_1700_10:
I don’t want to hear your excuses, Master Lear.
Maybe if you stopped playing hooky all the time,
you wouldn’t be so far behind!
story_27_51000/2401_1001_1800_10:
I know you’ve been sneaking out of your room
every night to skip out on your studies! Did you
think I wouldn’t notice?
story_27_51000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Starting tomorrow, I’m moving your training to
another facility where you’ll be able to focus your
attention on your studies!
story_27_51000/2401_1001_2500_10:
I’m glad you understand. This is for your own
good, Master Lear.
story_27_51000/2401_1001_2600_10:
Now, then. We’ll be taking our leave. I expect
you to make your way back on your own,
Master Lear.
story_27_51000/2401_1001_2700_10: I’ll see you when you return.
story_27_51000/2401_1001_2900_10:
I won’t be able to see Hoopa anymore...
I’ll be all alone... Again...
story_27_51000/2401_1001_3000_10:
Why does it have to be so hard? Why won’t
anybody help me?
story_27_51000/2401_1001_3100_10:
No one understands.
Not Rachel... Not Sawyer...
story_27_51000/2401_1001_3200_10: Who am I supposed to depend on?
story_27_51000/2401_1001_3400_10: No one’s ever been there for me. I’m alone.
story_27_51000/2401_1001_3500_10: Maybe...maybe I don’t need anyone’s help!
story_27_51000/2401_1001_3600_10:
There’s only one person in this world I can truly
depend on—
